name: Strange Home
description:
Strange Home by: Oposite

When you wake up, you realize that you are not in your home. you look at the window but its to late night, but you know that you are in a forest by the sounds and the house light, you dont know what are you doing there but you know that you need to scape, hurry up, he is coming.

this is for a jam, ill upload a better version soon.

this is my first game btw.

#BWjam
